text: In the 1987–88 season, USM Alger is competing in the National for the 17th time, as well as the Algerian Cup. They will be competing in National 1 and the Algerian Cup. ==Squad list== Players and squad numbers last updated on 1 September 1987. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
